name: Natsu de hajimete koi
short_description: 夏ではじめて恋 is an open source dating simulation game with the player having the option to customize the player statistics and even select the gender to play the game as either 美少女/乙女 mode. There is also the mode to select the visual novel mode and added specials like mini-game. View can be made as either first person or third person (with customizable avatar) and switch the game either as 2D or 3D scene. The mobile version, however, will be limited only to 2D third person mode. The main story of the game will be provided in the wiki once available but the full story mode of all possible routes or scenarios will be available only in the visual novel mode. Dating simulation mode will have some limited story flow but otherwise will simply behave like the real world settings.
summary: Open source renai game with option to select the gender of the player
